chat.content:
I will give you a Coq proof state, including both hypotheses and a specific goal and your need to prove it. Your response should be a singular code block of Coq proof, without any additional explanation or commentary. Follow to these guidelines:
Introduce variables using unique names to avoid any conflicts.
Keep each command distinct and separated, avoid concatenations like ';' or '[cmd|cmd]'.
Organize your proof with bullets like '-', '+', and '*' instead of braces ({, }). Shift to their double symbols like '--' and '++', when necessary.
Effectively use given premises, follow the syntax and structure demonstrated in the examples provided.

Example 1:

Hypotheses:
n, m: nat
IHn: m + n = n + m

Goal:
m + S n = S n + m

Proof:
```simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.```

Example 2:
Hypotheses:

Goal:
forall n m : nat, m + n = n + m

```intros n m. induction n.
- simpl. auto.
- simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.```

Sovle This Proof State:

Hypotheses:


Goal:
forall (d : preDTA) (sigma : signature) (m : Map bool), predta_correct_wrt_sign d sigma -> predta_correct_wrt_sign (preDTA_kill m d) sigma

Premises:
Inductive bool : Set := true : bool | false : bool
predta_correct_wrt_sign = fun (d : preDTA) (sigma : signature) => forall (a : ad) (s : state), MapGet state d a = Some s -> state_correct_wrt_sign s sigma : preDTA -> signature -> Prop
signature = Map nat : Set
preDTA = Map state : Set
Inductive Map (A : Type) : Type := M0 : Map A | M1 : ad -> A -> Map A | M2 : Map A -> Map A -> Map A For Map: Argument scope is [type_scope] For M0: Argument scope is [type_scope] For M1: Argument scopes are [type_scope _ _] For M2: Argument scopes are [type_scope _ _]
preDTA_kill = fix preDTA_kill (m : Map bool) (d : preDTA) {struct d} : preDTA := match d with | @M0 _ => M0 state | @M1 _ a s => match states_kill m s with | Some s' => M1 state a s' | None => M0 state end | @M2 _ d0 d1 => match preDTA_kill m d0 with | @M0 _ => match preDTA_kill m d1 with | @M0 _ => M0 state | @M1 _ a s' => M1 state (N.succ_double a) s' | @M2 _ m0 m1 => M2 state (M0 state) (M2 state m0 m1) end | @M1 _ a s' => let d0' := M1 state a s' in match preDTA_kill m d1 with | @M0 _ => M1 state (N.double a) s' |
predtas_correct_wrt_sign_compatibles : forall (sigma : signature) (d d' : preDTA), predta_correct_wrt_sign d sigma -> predta_correct_wrt_sign d' sigma -> predta_compatible d d'
predta_correct_wrt_sign_M2 : forall (d0 d1 : preDTA) (sigma : signature), predta_correct_wrt_sign (M2 state d0 d1) sigma -> predta_correct_wrt_sign d0 sigma /\ predta_correct_wrt_sign d1 sigma
predta_compat_check_correct : forall (d : preDTA) (sigma : signature), predta_correct_wrt_sign d sigma -> predta_compat_check d sigma = true
predta_compat_check_complete : forall (d : preDTA) (sigma : signature), predta_compat_check d sigma = true -> predta_correct_wrt_sign d sigma
kill_empty_correct_wrt_sign_invar_1 : forall (s : state) (sigma : signature) (m : Map bool), state_correct_wrt_sign s sigma -> state_correct_wrt_sign (states_kill_aux m s) sigma
dta_correct_wrt_sign = fun (d : DTA) (sigma : signature) => match d with | dta d0 _ => predta_correct_wrt_sign d0 sigma end : DTA -> signature -> Prop
dtas_correct_wrt_sign_compatibles : forall (sigma : signature) (d d' : DTA), dta_correct_wrt_sign d sigma -> dta_correct_wrt_sign d' sigma -> dta_compatible d d'
states_correct_wrt_sign_compatibles : forall (sigma : signature) (s s' : state), state_correct_wrt_sign s sigma -> state_correct_wrt_sign s' sigma -> st_compatible s s'
st_compat_check_0_complete : forall (s : state) (sigma : signature) (pa : pre_ad), st_compat_check_0 pa sigma s = true -> state_correct_wrt_sign_with_offset s sigma pa
st_compat_check_0_correct : forall (s : state) (sigma : signature) (pa : pre_ad), state_correct_wrt_sign_with_offset s sigma pa -> st_compat_check_0 pa sigma s = true
dta_compat_check_correct : forall (d : DTA) (sigma : signature), dta_correct_wrt_sign d sigma -> dta_compat_check d sigma = true
dta_compat_check_complete : forall (d : DTA) (sigma : signature), dta_compat_check d sigma = true -> dta_correct_wrt_sign d sigma
state_correct_wrt_sign_with_offset_M2 : forall (s0 s1 : state) (sigma : signature) (pa : pre_ad), state_correct_wrt_sign_with_offset (M2 prec_list s0 s1) sigma pa -> state_correct_wrt_sign_with_offset s0 sigma (pre_ad_O pa) /\ state_correct_wrt_sign_with_offset s1 sigma (pre_ad_I pa)
dta_compat_check = fun (d : DTA) (sigma : signature) => match d with | dta p _ => predta_compat_check p sigma end : DTA -> signature -> bool
dt_kill_0 : forall (d : preDTA) (m : Map bool) (a : ad) (s s' : state), states_kill m s = Some s' -> MapGet state d a = Some s -> MapGet state (preDTA_kill m d) a = Some s'
dta_app_ne_aux_def_ok : forall (d : preDTA) (m : Map bool), def_ok_app bool (ensemble_base state d) (dta_app_ne_aux d m)
predta_compat_check = fix predta_compat_check (d : preDTA) (sigma : signature) {struct d} : bool := match d with | @M0 _ => true | @M1 _ _ s => st_compat_check s sigma | @M2 _ x y => (predta_compat_check x sigma && predta_compat_check y sigma)%bool end : preDTA -> signature -> bool
st_compat_check = fun (s : state) (sigma : signature) => st_compat_check_0 pre_ad_empty sigma s : state -> signature -> bool
dt_kill_1 : forall (d : preDTA) (m : Map bool) (a : ad) (s : state), MapGet state (preDTA_kill m d) a = Some s -> exists s' : state, MapGet state d a = Some s' /\ states_kill m s' = Some s
st_compat_check_correct : forall (s : state) (sigma : signature), state_correct_wrt_sign s sigma -> st_compat_check s sigma = true
st_compat_check_complete : forall (s : state) (sigma : signature), st_compat_check s sigma = true -> state_correct_wrt_sign s sigma
dt_kill_empty_d : forall (d : preDTA) (a : ad) (t : term), reconnaissance d a t -> reconnaissance (preDTA_kill (dta_non_empty_states d) d) a t
dt_kill_empty_r : forall (d : preDTA) (a : ad) (t : term), reconnaissance (preDTA_kill (dta_non_empty_states d) d) a t -> reconnaissance d a t
state_correct_wrt_sign = fun (s : state) (sigma : signature) => forall (a : ad) (p : prec_list), MapGet prec_list s a = Some p -> exists n : nat, MapGet nat sigma a = Some n /\ pl_tl_length p n : state -> signature -> Prop
dt_kill_empty_semantics : forall (d : preDTA) (a : ad) (t : term), reconnaissance d a t < -> reconnaissance (preDTA_kill (dta_non_empty_states d) d) a t
dt_kill_empty_r_1 : forall (p' : prec_list) (n : nat) (d : preDTA) (p : prec_list) (tl : term_list), dt_kill_empty_def_1 n -> term_high_0 tl <= n -> liste_reconnait (preDTA_kill (dta_non_empty_states d) d) p tl -> prec_list_kill (dta_non_empty_states d) p' = Some p -> liste_reconnait d p' tl
dt_kill_empty_d_1 : forall (n : nat) (d : preDTA) (p : prec_list) (tl : term_list), dt_kill_empty_def_0 n -> term_high_0 tl <= n -> liste_reconnait d p tl -> exists p' : prec_list, prec_list_kill (dta_non_empty_states d) p = Some p' /\ liste_reconnait (preDTA_kill (dta_non_empty_states d) d) p' tl
state_correct_wrt_sign_with_offset = fun (s : state) (sigma : signature) (pa : pre_ad) => forall (a : ad) (p : prec_list), MapGet prec_list s a = Some p -> exists n : nat, MapGet nat sigma (pre_ad_concat pa a) = Some n /\ pl_tl_length p n : state -> signature -> pre_ad -> Prop
dt_kill_empty_def_1 = fun n : nat => forall (d : preDTA) (a : ad) (t : term), term_high t <= n -> reconnaissance (preDTA_kill (dta_non_empty_states d) d) a t -> reconnaissance d a t : nat -> Prop Argument scope is [nat_scope]
dt_kill_empty_def_0 = fun n : nat => forall (d : preDTA) (a : ad) (t : term), term_high t <= n -> reconnaissance d a t -> reconnaissance (preDTA_kill (dta_non_empty_states d) d) a t : nat -> Prop Argument scope is [nat_scope]
dta_app_ne_inc_2 : forall (d : preDTA) (m0 m1 m : Map bool), lem m0 m1 -> lem (dta_app_ne_aux d m0 m) (dta_app_ne_aux d m1 m)
st_compat_check_0 = fix st_compat_check_0 (pa : pre_ad) (sigma : signature) (s : state) {struct s} : bool := match s with | @M0 _ => true | @M1 _ a p => match pl_compat_check p with | Some n => match MapGet nat sigma (pre_ad_concat pa a) with | Some m => n =? m | None => false end | None => false end | @M2 _ x y => (st_compat_check_0 (pre_ad_O pa) sigma x && st_compat_check_0 (pre_ad_I pa) sigma y)%bool end : pre_ad -> signature -> state -> bool
pl_non_empty_path_true : forall (pl : pl_path) (p : prec_list) (m : Map bool), pl_path_incl pl p -> pl_path_true pl m -> pl_non_empty m p = true
semantic_equiv_0_6 : forall (n : nat) (t : term) (t0 : term_list), (forall (d : preDTA) (a : ad) (m : nat), rec_term d a t m = true -> reconnaissance d a t) -> (forall (d : preDTA) (p : prec_list) (m : nat), rec_list_terms d p t0 m = true -> liste_reconnait d p t0) -> forall (d : preDTA) (p : prec_list), rec_list_terms d p (tcons t t0) n = true -> liste_reconnait d p (tcons t t0)
pl_kill_prec_empty : forall (p : prec_list) (m : Map bool), prec_list_kill m p = Some prec_empty -> p = prec_empty
pl_path_true_ind : forall P : pl_path -> Map bool -> Prop, (forall m : Map bool, P pl_path_nil m) -> (forall (m : Map bool) (a : ad) (pl : pl_path), pl_path_true pl m -> P pl m -> MapGet bool m a = Some true -> P (pl_path_cons a pl) m) -> forall (p : pl_path) (m : Map bool), pl_path_true p m -> P p m
DTA_kill = fun (m : Map bool) (d : DTA) => match d with | dta p a => DTA_simpl (dta (preDTA_kill m p) a) end : Map bool -> DTA -> DTA
dt_non_empty_r_2 : forall (p : prec_list) (m : Map bool), pl_non_empty m p = true -> exists pl : pl_path, pl_path_true pl m /\ pl_path_incl pl p
pl_non_empty_path_true_rev : forall (p : prec_list) (m : Map bool), pl_non_empty m p = true -> exists plp : pl_path, pl_path_incl plp p /\ pl_path_true plp m
dta_app_ne = fun (d : preDTA) (m : Map bool) => dta_app_ne_aux d m m : preDTA -> Map bool -> Map bool

```intros d sigma m H. unfold predta_correct_wrt_sign, preDTA_kill in *. intros a s H'. destruct d; simpl in *.
- inversion H. rewrite H2 in *. inversion H'.
- destruct (states_kill m s) eqn:E.
  + inversion H. subst. apply kill_empty_correct_wrt_sign_invar_1 in H'. rewrite E in H'. inversion H'.
  + inversion H. subst. now rewrite E in *.```
